creator: koldun@id.ru
text:
This patch allow to use Type1 Cyrillic fonts in PS and PDF output.

Linked with patch for xmlgraphics-commons (bug 48395), using method defineAdobeCyrillicEncoding, added in it.

creator: koldun@id.ru
text:
Created attachment 24709
cyrillic glyphs and encoding support

Andrey, I'm a bit surprised about this patch. I've invested considerable effort some time ago to make cyrillic fonts work. What was your motivation to add the "AdobeStandardCyrillic" encoding? Was something not working as it should have? I'm not criticizing, just trying to understand.

Thanks anyway for contributing to FOP! I hope I have time soon to look at the patch. Of course, other committers are allowed to process this patch before that if they have time.
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 24711
Version with cyrillic encoding in AFM files parsing
